title: 2 Simple Ways to Install and Download the Uber App

steps.title: Open the App Store .
steps.content: Open the App Store . This looks like a white A with a blue background. You can usually find this on your home screen or in the App Library. Be sure to update your device to the latest version.

steps.title: Tap Search.
steps.content: Tap Search . This will be in the bottom-right corner. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Enter Uber in the search bar and tap search.
steps.content: Enter Uber in the search bar and tap search . If you want to become an Uber driver, you'll need to download the Uber - Driver app instead.

steps.title: Tap Uber.
steps.content: Tap Uber . You'll be redirected to Uber's app page.

steps.title: Tap Get.
steps.content: Tap Get . This is the blue button below the app name. If you downloaded this app previously or on another device, you'll see a cloud with an arrow icon instead.

steps.title: Confirm your download.
steps.content: Confirm your download. Depending on your device, you may need to provide your Touch ID , Face ID, or Apple ID password. Uber will begin downloading. The Get button will turn into a progress meter. When your download is finished, you'll see OPEN .

steps.title: Launch the Uber app.
steps.content: Launch the Uber app. Tap OPEN to quickly open the app from the App Store. You can also find and tap the app on your home screen. You can now use Uber to request rides and more.

steps.title: Open the Google Play Store .
steps.content: Open the Google Play Store . This looks like a multicolored triangle with a white background. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the search bar.
steps.content: Tap the search bar. You can find this at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Enter Uber in the search bar.
steps.content: Enter Uber in the search bar. Apps will load below. If you want to become an Uber driver, you'll need to download the Uber - Driver app instead.

steps.title: Tap Uber.
steps.content: Tap Uber . You'll be redirected to Uber's app page.

steps.title: Tap INSTALL.
steps.content: Tap INSTALL . This is at the top-right of the page. Uber will begin downloading. If prompted, tap ACCEPT to initiate the download.

steps.title: Launch the Uber app.
steps.content: Launch the Uber app. Tap OPEN to quickly open the app from the Google Play Store. You can also find and tap the app in your app drawer. You can now use Uber.
